characters: Driver of a white sedan, two trucks
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a highway. Two trucks are ahead, one in the left lane and one in the right lane. A white sedan appears in the right lane and overtakes the truck in the right lane.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and lane position, keeping a safe distance from the trucks ahead. The vehicle does not change lanes or speed significantly.
key_objects: 1) Front: Two trucks, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining their lanes. 2) Right: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, overtaking the truck in the right lane.
